iati-activity.reporting-org: Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC)
iati-activity.title: West Africa, SDC, Staff support to Ebola crisis
iati-activity.description: The current Ebola outbreak across Guinea, Liberia and Sierra Leone has surpassed all other outbreaks of the virus in terms of cases, deaths and geographic spread. The Multilateral organizations and the Governments’ bodies have increased their responses in their respective fields. Thus human and financial resources needs have increased, to which Switzerland has contributed up to CHF 29 Mio in 2014 and is maintaining its presence at field and HQ level in order to ensure an adequate follow-up.
iati-activity.participating-org: Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC)
